Unitron/Sixshot/Ares/Firestarter/Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee:





Unitron ducked under the autogun fire, his tendrils disconnecting from the 
two robots, and he moved on behind Double Punch and his minions.  The 
tendrils bored into the back of Double Punch and Manterror's heads, Unitron's 
hands going up on the back of Injector and Bumblebee's, a transmission being 
sent out towards Rapa Nui.

---

Autogun fire did almost no damage to Sixshot as he fired another missile from 
his launcher at the weakened wall.

---

Ares ducked under the fire, shooting three bolts of laser fire at three 
different autoguns.

---

Double Punch fired another two missiles at the damaged wall.

---

Manterror fired up at the cieling with two ion disks.

---

Injector fired off two stinger missiles at the same corner.

---

Bumblebee coughed and nearly fell over as his weaker design was getting 
damaged by the gas, two optic blasts errupting from his eyes at the ceiling.
